DOC.brief_summary: A double-blinded , randomize , crossover study healthy female placebo single dose imipramine 50 mg. Primary objective : Does imipramine increase tone external urethral sphincter ? Urethral Opening Pressure ( UOP ) measure Urethral Pressure Reflectometry ( UPR ) . UOP increase correlate effect treat stress urinary incontinence . Can imipramine treat stress urinary incontinence ? Secondary objective : Does imipramine increase tone anal sphincter ? The opening pressure measure Anal Acoustic Reflectometry ( AAR ) . The investigator also wish establish within-subject standard deviation AAR enable power calculation future study .
DOC.brief_title: Does Single Dose Imipramine Affect Opening Pressure Urethral Anal Sphincter ?
DOC.criteria: Signed consent form . Healthy . Female . Nonsmoker . Age 18 55 , inclusive . Normal weight : BMI 19.5 30.0 kg/m2 . Weight minimum 50 kg . No breastfeeding . No pregnancy study . No clinical trial study . Known allergy imipramine know constituent . Medical history significant cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , endocrinologic , hematologic , immunologic , metabolic , genitourologic , dermatologic , psychiatric , neurologic dermatologic disease , lung disease , kidney disease , malignant disease significant disease assess investigator . Medical history urinary incontinence . Infectious disease 1 week prior study day 1 study day 2 . Clinically significant finding physical examination . Pregnancy . Heart rate < 40 > 100 beat per minute . Mean systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg mean diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg ( mean measure screen day ) . Prescription , counter herbal medication two week prior study day 1 study day 2 . Excluding paracetamol exclude oral contraceptive . Smoking 3 month prior study day 1 study day 2 . Alcohol abuse , mean > 14 unit ( 12 g alcohol ) per week within three week prior study day 1 study day 2 . Drug abuse 3 month prior study day 1 study day 2 . Any condition assess investigator .
